sentences.sentence: He'll also meet the emperor and the empress at a lunch on Tuesday.
sentences.translation: 他还将在周二的午餐会上会见皇帝和皇后。

sentences.sentence: "How much the bird reminds me of the musical box that belonged to our blessed Empress," said an old knight.
sentences.translation: 一位老骑士说：“这只鸟使我想起了我们逝去的皇后的八音盒。”

sentences.sentence: The company received a commercial boost from the Empress Eugenie of France, when she decided the new colour flattered her.
sentences.translation: 该公司从法国皇后尤金妮娅那里得到了商业支持，因为她觉得新颜色让她更美了。
